New Records: Shohei Ohtani is having a historic season with 53 home runs and 55 stolen bases, making him the first player in history to reach 50 of each.
Key Match Events: The Dodgers host the San Diego Padres in a three-game series beginning Tuesday, then travel to Denver for a three-game series against the Colorado Rockies.
Pre-Game Insights: Should the Dodgers win two of three against San Diego and clinch the NL West title, manager Dave Roberts might even insist Ohtani shut down the base stealing to lessen the chance of injury ahead of the postseason.
Post-Match Reflections: There are no post-match reflections in this article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers have never reached 4 million spectators in a season, although they have exceeded 3.7 million 10 times since 2013 and 14 times since 2006.
Others: The article discusses the NL West division title and the potential for the Dodgers to clinch it with a win against the Padres.
